name: mem-db
description: An in-memory database using inverted indices, built in Go
author: David Maidment <david@dmaidment.co.uk>

scripts.test-base: npm install && npm run install-go-deps && npm run build-binary && npm run run-binary && mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*.ts
scripts.test-local: npm run test-base; npm run kill-running-binary
scripts.test-remote: npm run test-base && npm run kill-running-binary
